```{r plotcats}
totals <<- fy16testing_transactions %>% group_by(level_1_category) %>% summarise(cat_total = sum(dollars_obligated)) %>% collect()
total_strings <- totals %>% mutate(dollar_totals = to_currency(cat_total, currency_symbol = "$", symbol_first = TRUE, group_size = 3, group_delim = ",", decimal_size = 2,decimal_delim = ".")) %>% collect()                                                                                                     

total_strings %>% filter(is.na(level_1_category) == FALSE)%>%
    ggplot(aes(x=as.factor(level_1_category), y=cat_total, label = dollar_totals) ) + 
    geom_col() +geom_text(angle=90, color = "orange", size = 3, position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5))+
    theme(axis.text.x  = element_text(angle=90, vjust=0.5, size=10))
```

## Calc Addressability for GSA and BIC

```{r getaddressability}
tic()
gsa_addressable_markets <-  process_gsa_contracts()
write_csv(master_addressability_matrix, paste0("gsa_addressability_matrix",Sys.Date(),".csv"))
write_csv(gsa_addressable_markets, paste0("gsa_addressable_markets",Sys.Date(),".csv"))
rm(master_addressability_matrix)
bic_markets <- process_bic_contracts()
write_csv(master_addressability_matrix, paste0("bic_addressability_matrix",Sys.Date(),".csv"))
write_csv(bic_markets, paste0("bic_addressability",Sys.Date(),".csv"))
toc()


```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.

```{r generate FAS training data }
fas_addressability_matrix <- FAS_dplyr_gen_addressability_matrix_df("^GS..[FKQT]")
fas_addressability_matrix <- fas_addressability_matrix %>% filter(is.na(product_or_service_code) == FALSE & is.na(naics_code) == FALSE)
```


```{r generate FAS testing }
source("opt_addressability.R")
sc <- sparkInit()
load_spark_parquet("../../GWCM_Extracts/FY13_17_complete.prq/")
fas_addressability_matrix <- FAS_dplyr_gen_addressability_matrix_df("^GS..[FKQT]")
fas_addressability_matrix <- fas_addressability_matrix %>% filter(is.na(product_or_service_code) == FALSE & is.na(naics_code) == FALSE)
fy13fas_addressability_df <- dplyr_gen_testPhase_df(fas_addressability_matrix, fy13testing_transactions)
fy14fas_addressability_df <- dplyr_gen_testPhase_df(fas_addressability_matrix, fy14testing_transactions)
fy15fas_addressability_df <- dplyr_gen_testPhase_df(fas_addressability_matrix, fy15testing_transactions)
fy16fas_addressability_df <- dplyr_gen_testPhase_df(fas_addressability_matrix, fy16testing_transactions)
fy17fas_addressability_df <- dplyr_gen_testPhase_df(fas_addressability_matrix, fy17testing_transactions)
common_fy13fas_addressability_df <- fy13fas_addressability_df %>% filter(level_1_category_group == "GWCM")
common_fy14fas_addressability_df <- fy14fas_addressability_df %>% filter(level_1_category_group == "GWCM")
common_fy15fas_addressability_df <- fy15fas_addressability_df %>% filter(level_1_category_group == "GWCM")
common_fy16fas_addressability_df <- fy16fas_addressability_df %>% filter(level_1_category_group == "GWCM")
common_fy17fas_addressability_df <- fy17fas_addressability_df %>% filter(level_1_category_group == "GWCM")
total_addressability <- double()
gwcm_addressability <- double()
fiscal_year <- numeric()
total_addressability <- c(fy13fas_addressability_df %>% select(dollars_obligated) %>% sum(), 
                          fy14fas_addressability_df %>% select(dollars_obligated) %>% sum(),
                          fy15fas_addressability_df %>% select(dollars_obligated) %>% sum(),
                          fy16fas_addressability_df %>% select(dollars_obligated) %>% sum(),
                          fy16fas_addressability_df %>% select(dollars_obligated) %>% sum())

gwcm_addressability <- c(common_fy13fas_addressability_df %>% select(dollars_obligated) %>% sum(),
                         common_fy14fas_addressability_df %>% select(dollars_obligated) %>% sum(),
                         common_fy15fas_addressability_df %>% select(dollars_obligated) %>% sum(),
                         common_fy16fas_addressability_df %>% select(dollars_obligated) %>% sum(),
                         common_fy17fas_addressability_df %>% select(dollars_obligated) %>% sum())

fiscal_year <- c(2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017)

fas_fy13_awards <- capture_FAS_Training_Awards("^GS..[FKQT]", "2012-10-01", "2013-09-30")
fas_fy14_awards <- capture_FAS_Training_Awards("^GS..[FKQT]", "2013-10-01", "2014-09-30")
fas_fy15_awards <- capture_FAS_Training_Awards("^GS..[FKQT]", "2014-10-01", "2015-09-30")
fas_fy16_awards <- capture_FAS_Training_Awards("^GS..[FKQT]", "2015-10-01", "2016-09-30")
fas_fy17_awards <- capture_FAS_Training_Awards("^GS..[FKQT]", "2016-10-01", "2017-09-30")
fas_actual_obligations <- c(fas_fy13_awards%>%select(dollars_obligated)%>%collect()%>%sum(), fas_fy14_awards%>%select(dollars_obligated)%>%collect()%>%sum(), fas_fy15_awards%>%select(dollars_obligated)%>%collect()%>%sum(), fas_fy16_awards%>%select(dollars_obligated)%>%collect()%>%sum(), fas_fy17_awards%>%select(dollars_obligated)%>%collect()%>%sum())

fas_fy13_bpa_awards <- capture_FAS_Dependent_BPA_Training_Awards("^GS..[FKQT]", "2012-10-01", "2013-09-30")
fas_fy14_bpa_awards <- capture_FAS_Dependent_BPA_Training_Awards("^GS..[FKQT]", "2013-10-01", "2014-09-30")
fas_fy15_bpa_awards <- capture_FAS_Dependent_BPA_Training_Awards("^GS..[FKQT]", "2014-10-01", "2015-09-30")
fas_fy16_bpa_awards <- capture_FAS_Dependent_BPA_Training_Awards("^GS..[FKQT]", "2015-10-01", "2016-09-30")
fas_fy17_bpa_awards <- capture_FAS_Dependent_BPA_Training_Awards("^GS..[FKQT]", "2016-10-01", "2017-09-30")
fas_bpa_obligations <- c(fas_fy13_bpa_awards%>%select(dollars_obligated)%>%collect()%>%sum(), fas_fy14_bpa_awards%>%select(dollars_obligated)%>%collect()%>%sum(), fas_fy15_bpa_awards%>%select(dollars_obligated)%>%collect()%>%sum(), fas_fy16_bpa_awards%>%select(dollars_obligated)%>%collect()%>%sum(), fas_fy17_bpa_awards%>%select(dollars_obligated)%>%collect()%>%sum())
fas_total_obligations <- fas_actual_obligations+fas_bpa_obligations
FAS_addressability_results <- data_frame(fiscal_year, gwcm_addressability, total_addressability, fas_actual_obligations, fas_bpa_obligations, fas_total_obligations)
write_csv(FAS_addressability_results, "FAS_Addressability_Results2.csv")
```
